author: Martha Tesema
title: Miranda Kerr says she and the Snapchat CEO aren't having sex until marriage
text:
Normally what goes on inside the bedroom of high-profile couples stays inside the bedroom ‚Äî unless nothing goes on and they want to share that with everyone.
In a recent interview with The Times of London , the usually private supermodel Miranda Kerr spilled her real thoughts on Facebook (she hates it) but also shared some information about her relationship with fianc√© Evan Spiegel , also known as Snapchat's CEO.
SEE ALSO: Miranda Kerr to Facebook: 'How do they sleep at night?'
After the topic of contraceptives was brought up, Kerr responded matter-of-factly that she doesn't use any because the two are waiting to consummate their relationship after wedding bells ring. ‚ÄúNot until after we get married,‚Äù she said. ‚Äú[Spiegel] is very traditional. We can‚Äôt ‚Ä¶ I mean we‚Äôre just ‚Ä¶ waiting.‚Äù
According to the article, the reporter consoled her after she giggled and exclaimed, "I know!"
I said yes!!! ‚ù§Ô∏èüòç‚ù§Ô∏èüòç‚ù§Ô∏è
A photo posted by Miranda (@mirandakerr) on Jul 20, 2016 at 8:39am PDT
Looks like Kerr, who has a child with Orlando Bloom, is following in the footsteps of Ciara and Russell Wilson ‚Äîanother couple who, while not virgins, have chosen to reveal their personal decision not to have sex until marriage.
And now we will go back to minding our own business.
